infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to find nearby parking spots and dry cleaners.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location to find nearby parking spots and dry cleaners.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos of your shop and contact person.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select images for your shop.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone for video capture.

plugins.photosPermission: This app needs access to your photos to upload shop and profile images.
plugins.cameraPermission: This app needs access to your camera to take photos of your shop and contact person.
This app needs access to your camera to take photos.

plugins.photosPermission: This app needs access to your photo library to save and select images.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: This app needs permission to save photos to your library.
